__TOC__
==Description==
[[Grappling Hook]]s were added in the [[Naval Warfare Reborn]] expansion. They are crafted with [[Tailoring]] using [[Ingots]] and [[Cloth]]. They are used to board enemy [[Ships]]. This can be useful against [[Galleons]], when you are out gunned but not outnumbered. Simply use the [[Grappling Hook]] on the enemy vessel and you will be teleported across, into their boat, where you can slay them.

==Usage==
You can board an enemies ship by double clicking the [[Grappling Hook]]. You will be presented with a target reticle. Targeting any area of the Ship will result in teleporting to the enemy vessel.

==Types==
There are two types of [[Grappling Hook]] that can be used on a ship. 
:'''[[Grappling Hook]]''': 10 Charges.
:'''Superb [[Grappling Hook]]''': 30 charges and lower cooldown.
